vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰανναί (Rec. -νά), ὁ,
Jannai: Luk.3:24.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.24;
son of: Joseph (G2501J);
father of: Melchi (G3197); also called in KJV: Janna at Luk.3.24;
§ Janna, (Proper name), indeclinable, Lk. 3:24*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
雅拿 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "茂盛, 繁茂"
基督家譜中, 約瑟的兒子, 麥基的父親 (路 3:24)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
雅拿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "茂盛, 繁茂"
基督家谱中, 约瑟的儿子, 麦基的父亲 (路 3:24)
